title: Sentinel Modules Status
description: Single source of truth for module states - Documentation only, not consumed by any backend

sentinelCore.description: Core dashboard interface - displays static information only
sentinelCore.reason: No backend processing available, browser-based UI only

audit.description: Audit log viewer - displays pre-defined demo entries
audit.reason: Cannot access real system logs due to browser security restrictions

logging.description: System logging interface - demonstration mode only
logging.reason: Static web app cannot access operating system logs

aiAgents.description: AI agent management - no real AI models implemented
aiAgents.reason: No AI/ML infrastructure, no model training, no inference capability

androidPipeline.reason: No Android application built, no signing keys configured, intentionally frozen for Phase A

licensing.reason: No commercial product, no payment processing, no license validation infrastructure

monetization.reason: Free demonstration project, no business model implemented

threatDetection.reason: Requires backend infrastructure, AI models, and system-level access - none implemented

networkMonitoring.reason: Browser security model prevents network packet inspection

userAuthentication.reason: No backend database, no authentication service, purely static frontend

active.meaning: Fully functional with real backend processing

active-demo.meaning: UI is functional but shows simulated/demo data only, no real processing

read-only.meaning: Can display information but cannot modify or process data

disabled.meaning: Not implemented, not functional, intentionally turned off

architectureNotes.currentStack: Static HTML/CSS/JavaScript hosted on Cloudflare Pages
architectureNotes.securityModel: Browser sandbox only - no system-level access

transparency.purpose: This file serves as documentation of current system capabilities
transparency.commitmentToHonesty: All status values reflect actual implementation state, not planned features
